description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing several HTTP GET endpoints including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints such as welcome message, Swagger UI redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message indicating the backend is accessible.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Generates a redirect to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple OK status indicating the application is healthy.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides application information as a string.
